title: Mush - Humanity's last ship, lost in space... with a traitor aboard!

alpha.homepage:
eMush is not currently open to the public as the game is not fully finished and is infested with Mush!!!

If you are interested in the game, feel free to join us on Discord and on the Eternal-Twin forums. All information is available on Eternal-Twin.

About the eMush alpha, private ships are regularly being launched with the help of volunteers on Discord. To be part of an alpha ship, you will have to register on Eternal-Twin and join the list of volunteers on Discord.

If you are not shortlisted for an alpha ship, don't worry! The selection list rotates for each ship to offer everyone a chance.
alpha.description: This is an alpha for testers only.
alpha.inventoryDescription: Click here to open the Room Inventory

deathpage.title: You are dead !
deathpage.name: name
deathpage.notyet: Vous serez notifié quand le classement de fin de partie sera publié.
